ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I'm not very fast.
🏡 I carry my home on my back.
🌿 I like to eat seaweed.

ocean.question: I am a very large animal that lives in the ocean and has a big spout of water on my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal.
🎶 I can sing songs.
💧 I breathe air but live in the water.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can squeeze through small spaces. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am an invertebrate.
🎨 I can change color.
💧 I release ink when scared

ocean.question: I am a type of fish with a very flat body. Sometimes I get shocked if you touch me! What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I can generate electricity.
🏖️ I live on the ocean floor.
🥞 I'm flat like a pancake.

ocean.question: I'm a long, thin fish that can be brown, green, or black, and hide amongst the seaweed. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I slither around in the water.
🌾 I like to hide in tall grasses of the ocean.
🎣 Some people catch me for food.

ocean.question: I am a very colorful fish that lives in coral reefs and is famous for living in a sea anemone. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I have a special relationship with a stinging creature.
🧡 I am often orange and white.
🏠 I live in a sea anemone.

ocean.question: I am a group of tiny sea animals that build skeletons which create large reefs over many years. What am I?

hints.text: 🏘️ I build underwater structures.
🌡️ I am sensitive to ocean temperature changes.
⚪ My skeletons are made of calcium carbonate.

ocean.question: I am a large, ancient reptile that lives in the ocean and comes ashore to lay my eggs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I have a hard shell.
🥚 I bury my eggs in the sand.
🌱 I like to eat jellyfish.

ocean.question: I am a very deep, dark part of the ocean where sunlight cannot reach. What is this place?

hints.text: 🌑 It is very cold.
🔦 Animals here make their own light.
🌊 It is also the deepest part of the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a powerful current of warm water that flows from the Gulf of Mexico up the eastern coast of North America and across the Atlantic Ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🗺️ I affect the climate of Europe.
🌡️ I help keep the water warmer.
🇲🇽 I originate near Mexico.

food.question: I am long and yellow, and monkeys love to peel and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow on trees in warm places.
💛 My skin is usually thrown away after eating.
🍌 My name starts with the same letter as 'ball'.

food.question: I am white, cold, and delicious. I'm often served in a cone or a cup. What am I?

hints.text: 🍨 I come in many different flavors.
☀️ I am a popular treat on a hot day.
🥄 You usually need a spoon to eat me.

food.question: I am round and orange, and I'm a popular vegetable in the fall. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 I am used to make Jack-o'-lanterns.
🥧 I can be made into a pie.
🧡 My name rhymes with 'bumpkin'.

food.question: I am a crunchy snack, often served with a dip. I can be made from potatoes or corn. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I can be salty or sweet.
🧅 I can come in a bag.
🎉 Sometimes I am served at parties.

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast, and baked in an oven. People eat me with butter or jam. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am a staple food in many countries.
🥪 You can make sandwiches with me.
🔥 I need to be cooked to be eaten.

food.question: I am a small, round fruit that can be red, green, or black. I grow in bunches on vines. What am I?

hints.text: 🍷 I can be made into juice or wine.
🍇 I am often found in fruit salads.
🪴 My name rhymes with 'drape'.

food.question: I am a dish made with rice, vegetables, and sometimes meat or seafood. I'm popular in Asian cuisine. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I'm often served in a bowl.
🥢 You might need chopsticks to eat me.
🔥 I am often cooked in a wok.

food.question: I am a sweet treat with a hole in the middle. I come in many flavors and are often covered in sprinkles. What am I?

hints.text: 🍩 Police officers love me (in cartoons).
☕ I'm often eaten with coffee.
🍩 My name rhymes with 'sonut'.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and bright green flesh inside. I'm originally from China. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 My name sounds like a bird from New Zealand.
🥄 You can eat me with a spoon.
🟩 My insides are often tangy.

food.question: I am a dairy product made by fermenting milk. I'm often eaten with fruit or granola. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I contain probiotics that are good for your tummy.
🇬🇷 There's a specific type of me that comes from Greece.
🥄 You can eat me for breakfast, lunch or dinner.
